titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of Illustrations from the Gelett Burgess Papers [graphic], ca. 1894-ca. 1920
titlestmt.author: Processed by The Bancroft Library staff

publicationstmt.p: The Regents of the University of California. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid derived from typescript by rekeying; finding aid encoded by James Lake and Jamie Jesson. Date of source: ca. 1972.

change.item: EAD v1.0 finding aid converted to EAD 2002 using UC Berkeley's eadv1to2002.pl perl script.
EAD v2002 finding aid upgraded to OAC BPG 2.0 using UC Berkeley's bpgifier.pl perl script.
Reordered many top-level elements for consistency, grouping several into two new descgrp elements
Changed many top-level element heads for consistency

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Illustrations from the Gelett Burgess Papers [graphic],
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Collection includes illustrations for books, magazines, and other projects; and various other works of art.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been assigned to The Bancroft Library. All requests for permission to publish or quote from manuscripts must be submitted in writing to the Head of Public Services. Permission for publication is given on behalf of The Bancroft Library as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission of the copyright holder, which must also be obtained by the reader.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Illustrations from the Gelett Burgess papers [graphic], BANC PIC 1953.006--A, The Bancroft Library, University of California, Berkeley.

archref.unittitle: Artwork from the Gelett Burgess Papers,

did.unittitle: Blue Goops and Red. Drawings.
Bookplate design for George W. Armes Memorial Library, Stiles Hall, Berkeley.
Calendar art work.
Christmas card.
Commercial art.
Goops. Sketches and drawings. One item as BANC PIC 1953.006.6-C.
History of Goopville. Drawings.
Imaginotions. Drawings.
The Inchling. Drawings.
Lady Mechante. Illustrations.
The Lark. Hand-illustrated case for volume.
Lettering, alphabets, etc., including original drawings of initials used in The Lark.
Lively city O'Ligg. Illustrations.
Liverbone goops. Sketches, drawings and one watercolor.
Magazine illustrations, primarily for The Puritan, The Sketch and other English magazines, ca. 1898-1900.
Maps.
Maxims of Methuselah. Drawings.
Mrs. Noah's Ark. Watercolor illustration.
Le Petit Journal des Refusees. Illustrations.
Purple Cow. Reproduction of Burgess drawing.
Rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam Jr., by Wallace Irwin. Illustrations.
Turn of the Screw. Illustrations.
Watercolors (misc.)
Misc. drawings and sketches. A few as BANC PIC 1953.006.24-AX.
Anthropoid Architecture in London. One drawing.
Portraits of Gelett Burgess, one by Norman Rockwell.
Photostats of three drawings; gift of California Book Club, May 1968.
